page.title: 44Day in the Life
page.content:
Shopping

Shops have changed quite a lot in the past few years. 60 years ago people did not have supermarkets. People had individual market shops and just normal shops.

Now we have shopping malls and supermarkets. So, long ago (60 years ago) what was a lot of shops is now big supermarkets .Markets are still about, 60 years later.

Here are some shops we have today:

ASDA,

TESCO,q

SPORTS DIRECT,

M&S,

CO-OPERATIVE,

PRIMARK,

CLAIRE’S,

SAINSBURY’S,

NEXT,

ACCESORIZE,

APPLE STORE,

PINEAPPLE,

WATERSTONES,

And WHSmith




Pupil of Montbelle
